title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 355.5 - Board, chair
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 355.5 - Board, chair

State Regulations

Whenever used in this Article: (a) Board means the Workers' Compensation

Board created under the Workers' Compensation Law. (b) Chair means the Chairman, Chairwoman or

Chair of the Workers' Compensation Board. The term Chairman appearing in this

Article shall be deemed to mean "Chair."
Notes

355.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
